entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.7°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.4°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Local blowing snow late in the evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
